alert.note: Alert for Crowley County; La Junta Vicinity, Otero County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 28 at 11:01PM MST until January 29 at 8:00AM MST by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 AM MST SUNDAY... ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 7 PM SUNDAY TO 11 AM MST MONDAY... * WHAT...For the Winter Weather Advisory, a mix of light snow and freezing drizzle. Additional snow accumulations of up to one inch and ice accumulations up to one tenth of an inch. For the Wind Chill Advisory, very cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 20 below zero. * WHERE...Crowley and Otero Counties. * WHEN...For the Winter Weather Advisory, until 8 AM MST Sunday. For the Wind Chill Advisory, from 7 PM Sunday to 11 AM MST Monday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute. The cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Dense freezing fog with visibility of one quarter mile or less and additional light icing is expected tonight into early Sunday morning.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Crowley County; La Junta Vicinity, Otero County
